conversations.conversation: my name is dee of corse ; im a mommy im enggaged to chris widby me and him have been together for maybe about 4 or 5 years not sure lol we have a 2 year old son named christopher anthoney and we just had a little girl on march 7th 2011 ; emily rose i love both my kids and im very addictive to them ; xoxoxo im only on this site to find new friends to communicate with i dont have a job my kids r my job
